brief: Winter Olympics 2026 is in full swing with Norwegian medal hopes across biathlon and skiing

radar: Hovland returns to PGA Tour action later this month after off-season training in Arizona. Ruud could face Alcaraz in Dubai quarterfinals if both advance through early rounds. Carlsen's World Rapid & Blitz title defense scheduled for late February in Kazakhstan.
